field.name: description
field.value: Currently, the AbstractScope class calls session.Close() instead of session.Dispose() when it itself is disposed of. With Ayende's changes to the NHibernate SessionImpl class to support System.Transactions making the distinction between Dispose and Close is very important.

comment.author: tylerburd
comment.text: The attached patch changes the call to session.Close() to session.Dispose() in AbstractScope.PerformDisposal().

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
